HomePage.welcomeSubMessage: Electrical Panel Label allows you to design, customize, and generate labels for electrical panels easily. The interface offers the following features:

features.rows: Creation and management of multiple module rows
features.customize: Customization of each module with icons, colors, and descriptions
features.dragDrop: Reorganization of modules by drag and drop

HomePage.tourPrompt: First visit? Follow the guide to discover all the features and get started quickly!

PanelLayout.title: Panel layout
PanelLayout.createOrLoadSession: Create a new session or load an existing one
PanelLayout.deleteRowConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this row? This action is irreversible

ProjectManagement.invalidFileFormat: The selected file is not a valid project file

UnitForm.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this module? This action is irreversible.

GlobalSettingsForm.title: Global Settings
GlobalSettingsForm.unitHeightTooltip: Height of a module in mm
GlobalSettingsForm.unitWidthTooltip: Width of a module in mm
GlobalSettingsForm.topColorTooltip: Background color of the top element
GlobalSettingsForm.crossSizeTooltip: Size of the cross in mm to help with cutting
GlobalSettingsForm.resetConfirmDescription: This action will reset all global settings. This action is irreversible.

RowContainer.deleteRowConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the row and all its modules. This action is irreversible.
RowContainer.deleteSelectedConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the selected modules. This action is irreversible.

PrintButton.printWindowBlocked: Unable to open the print window. Please check your popup blocker settings.

steps.welcome: Welcome to Electrical Panel Label! This guide presents the main features of the application to easily create labels for electrical panels.
steps.globalSettings: Adjust global settings here that affect the entire panel layout, such as standard module dimensions and print settings.
steps.sessions: Manage your work sessions here. Save your current work, load previous sessions, or start a new one. A 'Default Session' is created by default.
steps.projectManagement: Use these buttons to export your current project or import an existing project. Ideal for saving your work and reimporting it on any device.
steps.panelLayout: This is your main workspace. Create and manage your panel layout by adding rows and modules.
steps.addRow: Click here to add a new row to your circuit layout. Each row can contain multiple modules.
steps.unitAddCustomization: Click here to add a module
steps.unitManagement: Click on any module to customize it. Set the size, icon, description, colors, etc. You can also drag and drop modules to reorganize them. You can select modules to perform batch operations
steps.unitManagementButtons: You can add multiple modules at once. Also when modules are selected you will find here the batch operations
steps.RowManagement: You can delete or duplicate your row.
steps.svgPreview: View a live preview of your print document here. It shows the exact appearance of your final print sheet.
steps.download: Once satisfied with your design, download your label as an SVG file, ready for printing or further editing.
steps.print: To print your label directly, use this button. It opens a print dialog with your SVG properly formatted for printing.

IconManager.title: Custom Icons Manager
IconManager.uploadDescription: Upload a new custom SVG icon for your electrical panel labels.
IconManager.svgRequirementsDetails:
• File size: max 50KB
• Format: SVG only
• No scripts or event handlers
• Simple vector graphics
• Black fill for best compatibility
IconManager.deleteIconDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this icon? This action cannot be undone.
IconManager.missingFields: Please fill in all required fields
